Retrieving References Using DOI

Adam H Sparks

2018-05-22

Source: vignettes/retrieving_references.Rmd
retrieving_references.Rmd

Creating a sample of articles

Load the DOIs

library(gsheet)
doi <-
  gsheet2tbl(
    "https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1WGbblaDD8eIEBvkxWNBwIi1HL0FTo6-HsLDwMVrfZbI/edit?usp=sharing
"
  )

Get the bibtex entry

library(bib2df)
file <- "references.bib"
df_references <- bib2df(file)
df_references
##  [1] CATEGORY     BIBTEXKEY    ADDRESS      ANNOTE       AUTHOR      
##  [6] BOOKTITLE    CHAPTER      CROSSREF     EDITION      EDITOR      
## [11] HOWPUBLISHED INSTITUTION  JOURNAL      KEY          MONTH       
## [16] NOTE         NUMBER       ORGANIZATION PAGES        PUBLISHER   
## [21] SCHOOL       SERIES       TITLE        TYPE         VOLUME      
## [26] YEAR        
## <0 rows> (or 0-length row.names)
